DOC.brief_title: Genetical , Anthropometrical Biochemical Factors Influencing High Risk Subclinical Atherosclerosis
DOC.detailed_description: This study cross-sectionally evaluate consecutive patient outpatient clinic Dyslipidemia Hypertension Nephrology Medical Sections Dante Pazzanese Institute Cardiology , cardiologic tertiary hospital São Paulo - Brazil . After fulfilled inclusion criterion sign informed consent , brief medical history anthropometric data ( abdominal circumference , height weight body mass index calculation ) collect . Within month inclusion , patient underwent blood sample collection dose fast plasma glucose insulin 2 hour 75g dextrose test glucose insulin , fast serum triglyceride , total cholesterol , HDL cholesterol , creatinine , high sensitive c-reactive protein ( hs-CRP ) , HbA1c , thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) , free thyroxin ( fT4 ) , creatine kinase , adiponectin , resistin , leptin , tumor necrosis factor alpha ( TNF-α ) , lipoprotein associate phospholipase A2 ( Lp-PLA2 ) . Blood sample also store DNA ( rs2383206 , rs10757274 , rs10757278 , rs1051931 , rs16874954 rs1799724 ) RNA PLA2G7 ( 2-ΔCT ) , TNF-α ( 2-ΔCT ) , LEP ( 2-ΔCT ) , LEPR ( 2-ΔCT ) extraction analysis . Subclinical atherosclerosis evaluate four method : carotid doppler ultrasound , cardiac compute tomography , exercise stress test ankle-brachial index ( ABI ) . All test perform day . Carotid Doppler ultrasound perform use high-resolution Vivid 7 ultrasound ( GE , USA ) high-frequency linear transducer type 9 MHz automate measurement . Carotid Intima medium thickness ( cIMT ) evaluate 1 cm distal posterior wall leave right common carotid artery presence atherosclerotic plaque common , internal external carotid artery assess . Carotid plaque define presence focal wall thicken least 50 % great surround vessel wall , focal region IMT great 1.5 mm , protrude lumen distinct adjacent boundary . Cardiac Computed Tomography perform determine coronary calcium score ( CAC ) calcium distribution . Hepatic density perform evaluate presence hepatic steatosis Aquilion apparatus ( Toshiba Medical , Tochigi , Japan ) 64 rows detector . The acquisition tomographic data represent images average thickness ( 3 mm ) low intensity ( 50 milliamps , 120 kV ) couple electrocardiogram . Calcium score consider present density coronary artery 130 Housfield unit ( HU ) least 3 continuous pixel ( > 1 mm2 ) coronary artery . Calcium score comprise sum individual score leave right coronary artery . Exercise stress test perform follow one follow protocol : Bruce , modify Bruce Ellestad treadmill . The test interrupt maximum heart rate reach clinical symptom instal , include exhaustion . The exam consider positive : negative horizontal/descending deflection ST segment measure J point ≥1 mm , pain suggestive coronary artery disease , complex sustain ventricular arrhythmia , plateau drop systolic blood pressure effort and/or functional capacity lower 5 METS . ABI test perform patient supine position rest five minute . Palpation bilateral arterial pulse pedial , posterior tibial , popliteal brachial perform . Measures systolic pressure make 5 MHz ultrasonography . The relationship systolic diastolic pressure upper low limb use calculate ABI . The test consider positive least one relationships less 0.9 . Personal clinical characteristic patient describe accord group use absolute relative frequency qualitative characteristic summary measure ( mean , standard deviation , median , minimum maximum ) quantitative characteristic . Distribution variable test use Kolmogorov-Smirnov test . Comparative analysis non-normal data perform use Kruskal-Wallis test express median ( interquartile range ) . Normal data evaluate use analysis variance ( ANOVA ) express mean ± standard deviation . To evaluate association categorical variable chi-square test Fisher 's Exact test use . Analysis covariance ( ANCOVA ) adjust age sex use compare clinical biochemical measure group ( glucose , insulin , Homa-R , hs-PCR , HDL-c , triglyceride , LDL-c , HbA1c , TNF-α , leptin , 2 hour glucose regular use medication ) . Ordinal logistic regression use evaluate subclinical atherosclerosis . A two-tailed P value < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
